```{r setup, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
library(gghighlight)
library(maps)

life_exp <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/week14_global_life_expectancy.csv")
```

```{r}
life_expectancy_post_1950 <- 
  life_exp %>% 
  mutate(country_name = countrycode::countrycode(sourcevar = code, origin = "iso3c", destination = "country.name")) %>% 
  filter(year > 1949,
         !is.na(country_name),
         !code %in% grepl("OWID_", code))
```
